page.title: 07ROBERTSON'S TOFFEE FACTORY
page.content: Robertsons Toffee Factory started in 1955.At present it employs 23 local people,with pupils from the school employed for the busy summer months. Much of the work is now done by machine.Fudge and Toffees are made and all the ingredients have to be brought from south.For the fudge they use sugar,glucose,condensed milk,vegetable fat,butter and flavouring.Plain fudge is the best seller,but they make many flavours.All the wrapping of fudge and toffees is done by machine.Their product is sold all over Britain and even small packages are sent abroad. The fudge is taken to a depot in Fife for distribution,in their own container lorry.The factory gets many visits from schools and tourists.
